item.title: About
item.description: About this site This site is ment to function as a place to organize and archive my projects in a single place. Too many times I’ve started a project and never finish it because I’ve forgot about it or it became too messy to start all over again. By creating this site I hope to build a solid structure as future reference, use it to document progress over time of new ideas and help me reconsider and/or finish suspended projects.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
